cause.description:
We want to change the earth, one person at a time by making people more aware. This campaign is to inspire people across the globe to respect the earth and do what they can to make a difference. Every act, no matter how small, can and will make a difference
1. We can change the earth, one habit at a time.
2. We must respect and protect the environment.
3. Give your life purpose and meaning.
cause.mission: Our mission is to influence people's behavior to benefit the earth.
cause.name: Love Your Mother Earth Campaign
